anathema: Parley or make a deal with fiends, forgive those who deceive you, harm an innocent child
edict: Preserve primal areas, destroy blighted fey and agents of  Cyth-V’sug , protect those who placate you with offerings

<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Gendowyn (Lady of the Fangwood)](/Deities.aspx?ID=625)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>

</traits>

**Source** [Divine Mysteries Web Supplement](/Sources.aspx?ID=237) pg. 4

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Other Gods](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=2)

**Edicts** Preserve primal areas, destroy blighted fey and agents of [Cyth-V’sug](/Deities.aspx?ID=428), protect those who placate you with offerings

**Anathema** Parley or make a deal with fiends, forgive those who deceive you, harm an innocent child

**Area of Concern**
Fangwood Forest

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<column gap="tiny">

Dexterity or Charisma

**Divine Font** [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Sanctification** none

**Divine Skill** [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=48)

**Favored Weapon** [Whip](/Weapons.aspx?ID=404)

**Domains** [Earth](/Domains.aspx?ID=73), [Family](/Domains.aspx?ID=74), [Luck](/Domains.aspx?ID=81), [Nature](/Domains.aspx?ID=85)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Summon Fey](/Spells.aspx?ID=1700)

- **2nd**
[Oaken Resilience](/Spells.aspx?ID=1617)

- **5th**
[Nature's Pathway](/Spells.aspx?ID=1613)

</column>
name: Gendowyn (Lady of the Fangwood)
religious_symbol: Flower eye surrounded by vine wreath
